full_address: 2 Lady Musgrave Dr, Mountain Creek, Qld 4557
description:
Back on the Market! Inspect Today!

Tucked away behind private boundary walls and fences, and with quality finishes and features throughout, this impeccably maintained Mountain Creek home is ready to move in and enjoy!

Stylishly renovated and offering a fantastic layout that allows good separation for easy family living this superb 3 bedroom home includes; a huge main bedroom with retreat and stunning ensuite, 2 large and separate living areas with extra study/office space, an enormous covered entertaining area and deck, plenty of off-street parking with large tradesman’s shed, and a good-sized grassed area for the kids and pets or a perfect spot for a pool.

Centrally located with only one adjoining neighbour and great exposure for business advertising, this home offers easy access to everywhere whether walking, riding or driving. Local shops, parks, pool, public transport and the popular Mountain Creek Schools are all within walking distance, and with quick motorway access you can be north, south, east or west within a moment and you’re only a flat bike ride or few minutes’ drive to Mooloolaba Beach and Esplanade.

- Stylishly renovated 3 bedroom home with quality finishes and features throughout

- Large and air-conditioned main bedroom with retreat and stunning ensuite/2-way bathroom with walk-in shower

- 2 additional bedrooms with ceiling fans and built-in robes

- Huge, open-plan kitchen, living and dining area with an abundance of natural light

- Superb kitchen with 900mm stainless steel freestanding cooker, breakfast bar and dishwasher

- Separate and air-conditioned lounge room with bay window and study/office space at rear

- Modern 2nd bathroom, separate toilet and internal laundry

- Enormous and private covered entertaining deck offers multiple zones including an additional living space/TV area

- Low maintenance gardens with a custom-made putting green and large grassed area for the kids, pets or a pool

- Double off-street covered parking with additional space for a caravan, boat or trailer

- Quarter garage storage and large 6 x 3m tradesman’s shed with lighting and power

- 6.5kW solar power system, LED lighting, ceiling mounted speaker system, security screen doors, quality carpets, recently painted inside and out

- 2 split system/reverse cycle air-conditioners along with all vents and roof void ducting in place ready for a ducted air-conditioning system

- Walking distance to shops, parks, and just down the road from the popular Mountain Creek schools and TAFE

- Centrally located close to everything with quick access to motorway and only a few minutes’ drive to Mooloolaba Beach and Esplanade

- All located on a good-sized block that feels more spacious due to the stylish and private boundary walls and fences that surround the home

Property Code: 98
